title: 关于等价交换mod安装后crash的问题。急！在线等。。。
author: igdaddy
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bigdaddy 于 2012-5-19 14:52 编辑 

之前下的strawmaine的1.2.5基础包，自己只往里面放了4096id和idResolver，都是1.2.5版本的。结果往mods文件夹里一放等价交换2mod的jar文件进游戏就crash。

Mods loaded: 9
ModLoader 1.2.5
mod_MinecraftForge 3.1.2.94
mod_ModLoaderMp 1.2.5v1
mod_ReiMinimap v3.0_04 [1.2.5]
mod_TooManyItems 1.2.5 2012-04-13
mod_4096IDs version 1.0.1 for MC 1.2.5
mod_IDResolver 1.2.5 - Update 0
mod_BrewGuide 1.0
mod_CraftGuide 1.4.3 for Minecraft 1.2.3
      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.


--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 4da13cd1 --------
Generated 12-5-19 下午1:13
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
Java: 1.7.0, Oracle Corporation
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5800 Series version 4.1.11079 Compatibility Profile Context, ATI Technologies Inc.
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: ee.ItemModEE.setNoRepair()Lyr;
 at ee.ItemModEE.<init>(ItemModEE.java:13)
 at ee.ItemEECharged.<init>(ItemEECharged.java:38)
 at ee.ItemPhilosopherStone.<init>(ItemPhilosopherStone.java:23)
 at ee.EEItem.init(EEItem.java:79)
 at mod_EE.<init>(mod_EE.java:151)
 at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
 at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
 at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source)
 at ModLoader.addMod(ModLoader.java:287)
 at ModLoader.readFromModFolder(ModLoader.java:1347)
 at ModLoader.init(ModLoader.java:850)
 at ModLoader.addAllRenderers(ModLoader.java:157)
 at ahu.<init>(ahu.java:77)
 at ahu.<clinit>(ahu.java:8)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(Minecraft.java:394)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:732)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT ff220d57 ----------

我看看config里的ee结果什么id都木有，难道不是id的问题？？我是32位的java，64的win7。

实在是不知道咋办了，跪求强力支援。在线等。。。。。
